title: User Login with Email OTP
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using the email-based OTP method.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid registered email address.
Request OTP and enter the received OTP.
Submit the login form.
User is authenticated and redirected to the homepage or user dashboard.

title: User Login Failure with Invalid OTP
description: Ensure login fails when an invalid or expired OTP is submitted.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid registered email address.
Enter an invalid or expired OTP.
Submit the login form.
Display appropriate error message and deny access.

title: User Login with Social Account
description: Verify successful login via supported social login providers.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Click on a social login button (e.g., Google, Facebook).
Complete social login flow.
User is authenticated and redirected appropriately.

title: New User Auto-Registration on Social Login
description: Verify that a new user is auto-registered if logging in with a social account for the first time.

steps.description: Use a social login account not previously registered.
Complete social login authentication.
New user account is created and user is authenticated.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Validate that access to certain pages and actions are granted or denied based on user roles (buyer, seller, admin).

steps.description: Log in as buyer and attempt to access seller dashboard.
Access is denied or redirected appropriately.
Log in as seller and access seller dashboard.
Seller dashboard is accessible.
Log in as admin and access admin dashboard.
Admin dashboard is accessible with full management tools.

title: User Profile Management - Update Preferences and Verification Status
description: Verify users can view and update their profile including expat-specific preferences and their verification status is displayed correctly.

steps.description: Log in as a verified user.
Navigate to user profile page.
Update expat-specific preferences such as preferred region and language.
Save changes.
Changes are saved and updated preferences appear correctly.
Verification status displayed matches backend user verification level.

title: Create New Product Listing with Image Upload Validation
description: Ensure sellers can create new listings with valid images and that invalid image uploads are handled gracefully.

steps.description: Log in as a verified seller.
Navigate to new listing creation page.
Fill in product details including category, description, and price.
Upload one or more images within allowed size and formats.
Images are previewed correctly and accepted.
Submit listing form.
Listing is created and visible in seller's listing dashboard.
Attempt to upload disallowed image format or too large image.
Appropriate error messages appear and upload is prevented.

title: Edit and Archive Product Listing Flows
description: Validate sellers can edit existing listings and archive outdated or sold listings, with correct status updates reflected.

steps.description: Log in as a seller.
Navigate to seller listing management dashboard.
Edit product details of an existing listing.
Save edited listing.
Listing details are updated and displayed correctly.
Archive an existing listing.
Listing status updates to archived and is not visible in public marketplace.

title: Browse and Filter Marketplace Listings
description: Confirm users can browse marketplace listings without login, and apply multiple filters including category, price range, and premium badge.

steps.description: Open marketplace browse page as anonymous user.
Listings load with featured and premium badges visible.
Apply category filter to narrow down listings.
Listings update to show only items in selected category.
Apply price range filter.
Listings refresh to conform to selected price range.
Apply premium badge filter.
Only premium listings are shown.
Combine multiple filters and search query.
Listings update accordingly with relevant items displayed.

title: Real-Time Messaging Between Verified Buyers and Sellers
description: Verify that only verified buyers can send real-time messages to sellers and that messages appear in both sender and recipient interfaces.

steps.description: Log in as a verified buyer.
Navigate to a seller's product detail page.
Initiate a message conversation using messaging interface.
Send a message to the seller.
Message is delivered in real-time to the seller's inbox.
Log in as the seller.
Seller sees the incoming buyer message immediately.
Reply to the buyer.
Buyer receives the seller's message in real-time.
Attempt message sending as unverified buyer.
Messaging interface is disabled or message sending is blocked.

title: Admin Monitoring and Notification of Overdue Listings
description: Confirm admins can view overdue listings, send notifications to sellers, and archive overdue items.

steps.description: Log in as admin.
Navigate to admin listings dashboard.
Overdue listings appear categorized and sorted.
Select an overdue listing and send notification to seller.
Notification is logged and seller receives alert.
Archive an overdue listing via admin panel.
Listing is moved to archive and no longer appears in active listings.

title: Currency Toggle and Multi-Currency Support
description: Validate that users can toggle between currencies and product prices and cart totals update accordingly.

steps.description: Open any marketplace listing or cart page.
Switch currency toggle to a different supported currency.
All product prices and totals reflect the selected currency with correct conversion.
Reload page and confirm persistence of selected currency preference.

title: Responsive Design Validation across Desktop, Tablet, and Mobile
description: Verify UI layout, navigation, and accessibility conform across desktop (>=1024px), tablet (768px), and mobile (375px) screen sizes.

steps.description: Load homepage in large desktop viewport.
Full header, hero carousel, and menu are visible and functional.
Resize viewport to tablet width (768px).
Header adjusts, navigation collapses appropriately, and content remains accessible.
Resize viewport to mobile width (375px).
Mobile navigation is accessible via toggle, content is readable and controls usable.

title: Accessibility Compliance Testing for WCAG 2.1 AA
description: Check that all major UI components, including forms, navigation, and messaging interfaces, meet accessibility standards.

steps.description: Perform keyboard-only navigation through main pages and forms.
All interactive elements are reachable and usable via keyboard.
Use screen reader to navigate listing pages and verify ARIA labels and roles.
Correct and descriptive labels are read, and focus is visible.
Check color contrast ratios comply with WCAG 2.1 AA.
Text and relevant UI elements have sufficient contrast.

title: Error Handling and Validation on Forms
description: Test that all user input forms enforce proper validation rules and display meaningful error messages on invalid input.

steps.description: Navigate to registration form.
Submit form with missing required fields.
Appropriate error messages highlight missing fields.
Submit form with invalid data formats (email, phone number).
Validation errors prevent submission with informative messages.
Try invalid input on product listing creation and profile update forms.
Validation responds correctly in all relevant contexts.

title: Loading States and Lazy Loading Behavior
description: Verify that loading skeletons and lazy loading are used to improve user experience during data or component fetching.

steps.description: Navigate to browse or homepage with slow network throttling.
Loading skeletons appear where content will load.
Scroll through listings and image-heavy pages.
Images and components lazy load as they come into viewport.

title: Persistent Shopping Cart Storage Across Sessions
description: Ensure items added to the cart persist through page reloads and user sessions where applicable.

steps.description: Add multiple items to shopping cart.
Cart icon updates to reflect item counts.
Reload the browser or close and reopen tab.
Cart contents remain preserved and accessible.
Log out and log back in.
Cart content is retained if user is authenticated; otherwise cleared as per spec.

title: Seller Verification Workflow and Badge Assignment
description: Confirm that sellers can submit verification documents, admins can approve, and approved sellers receive corresponding badges.

steps.description: Register as seller and submit required verification documents.
Confirm verification submission acknowledgement.
Log in as admin and approve seller verification.
Log in as seller and verify premium seller badge is displayed.
Seller dashboard and listings reflect premium badge status.

title: Localization and Regional Cultural Adaptations
description: Verify that users see localized language, currency, color themes, and traditional patterns according to selected region settings.

steps.description: Change language and region preferences in user profile.
UI text updates to selected language.
Currency toggles to appropriate regional currency.
Theme colors and cultural pattern overlays adjust accordingly.

title: Homepage Hero Carousel Functionality
description: Validate that the homepage hero carousel displays rotating featured categories and trust indicators with proper controls and responsiveness.

steps.description: Open homepage.
Hero carousel cycles through featured categories automatically.
Manually navigate carousel using controls.
Carousel responds to manual navigation inputs as expected.
Verify trust indicators and CTA buttons are visible on carousel slides.

title: Error Boundary and Graceful Recovery
description: Test that the application gracefully handles unexpected errors and displays error boundaries without crashing the whole UI.

steps.description: Simulate an error in a component (e.g., by forcing a render error).
Error boundary displays a user-friendly message or fallback UI.
Rest of the application remains functional and navigable.
